dict.string: Click the "Pay Now" button, then you will be directed to the Akulaku PayLater Payment Center page.
Select the desired installment tenure, then Login to your Akulaku PayLater account by entering your mobile number and password.
Enter the verification code (OTP) that has been sent to your mobile number, then click the "Next" button.
A confirmation page will be shown to you, then you can finish your transaction.
